name: A Speedy Influence
description:
A Speedy Influence is a game in early acces,

you have to drive around the city, trying to get as much drugs as possible.

The game is still in early acces, and has alot of issues. Feel free to leave feedback.

FUTURE UPDATES

  • Fix the driveable car
  • Fix collision
  • Rework the drugs system
  • Finish creating building models
  • Improve graphics
  • Add console controller input
  • Add audio

This game has been made by: Jack Hulspas.
